product_name: Advanced Elements Hula Inflatable Stand Up Paddleboard - 11'
long_description: Unfold, inflate, and hit the water in a matter of minutes! Suited for easy storage and rough waters, this inflatable stand up paddleboard provides substantial advantages to the traveling paddler.
short_description: Unfold, inflate, and hit the water in a matter of minutes! Suited for easy storage and rough waters, this inflatable stand up paddleboard provides substantial advantages to the traveling paddler.
